name: Andela
description: Andela was created with one thing in mind: Brilliance is evenly distributed, but opportunity isn’t. Our platform bridges that gap. We specialize in helping our highly-skilled, global technology talent community in emerging markets, connect with hundreds of leading companies like InVision, Cloudflare, and ViacomCBS who leverage Andela to scale their technology teams quickly and cost-effectively. Our talent spans six continents and Andela is backed by investors including Generation Investment Management, SoftBank, Chan Zuckerberg Initiative, Spark Capital, and Google Ventures.

enhanced_description: Andela aims to change the way the world works by bridging the gap between brilliant global technology talent in emerging markets and leading companies seeking to scale their technology teams. Their platform provides access to a highly-skilled, diverse talent community spanning six continents, enabling organizations to hire top digital talent quickly, efficiently, and cost-effectively. Andela leverages a top-rated developer assessment tool to ensure qualified and certified professionals, helping over 600 organizations realize the benefits of borderless hiring.
